121101.Desc: If the target ally's current HP is equal to their Max HP when Invigoration ends, regenerates 8 extra Energy for this target.

121102.Name: Sylphic Slumber
121102.Desc: After using her Ultimate, Bailu's Outgoing Healing increases by an additional 15% for 2 turn(s).

121103.Name: Omniscient Opulence
121103.Desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

121104.Name: Evil Excision
121104.Desc: Every healing provided by the Skill makes the recipient deal 10% more DMG for 2 turn(s). This effect can stack up to 3 time(s).

121105.Name: Waning Worries
121105.Desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

121106.Name: Drooling Drop of Draconic Divinity
121106.Desc: Bailu can heal allies who received a killing blow 1 more time(s) in a single battle.

121201.Name: Lucent Moonglow
121201.Desc: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single enemy target.

121202.Name: Transcendent Flash
121202.Desc: Deals Ice DMG to a target enemy and obtains 1 stack of Syzygy.

121203.Name: Florephemeral Dreamflux
121203.Desc: Deals massive Ice DMG to a target enemy and deals Ice DMG to adjacent targets. Obtains 1 stack of Syzygy.

121204.Name: Crescent Transmigration
121204.Desc: When possessing 2 stacks of Syzygy, Jingliu enters the Spectral Transmigration state with her Action Advanced by 100%, her CRIT Rate increased, and her Skill becoming Enhanced. Using an attack in this state consumes HP from all other allies and increases Jingliu's ATK according to the total HP consumed. When Syzygy stacks become 0, exits the Spectral Transmigration state.

121207.Name: Shine of Truth
121207.Desc: Creates a Special Dimension around the character. Enemies within this dimension will become Frozen. After entering combat with enemies in the dimension, this character regenerates Energy and obtains 1 stack of Syzygy with a high chance to Freeze enemies.

121201.Name: Moon Crashes Tianguan Gate
121201.Desc: When using her Ultimate or Enhanced Skill, Jingliu's CRIT DMG increases by 24% for 1 turn(s). If only one enemy target is attacked, the target will additionally be dealt Ice DMG equal to 100% of Jingliu's ATK.

121202.Name: Crescent Shadows Qixing Dipper
121202.Desc: After using Ultimate, increases the DMG of the next Enhanced Skill by 80%.

121203.Name: Halfmoon Gapes Mercurial Haze
121203.Desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

121204.Name: Lunarlance Shines Skyward Dome
121204.Desc: During the Spectral Transmigration state, the ATK gained from consuming allies' HP is additionally increased by 90% of the total HP consumed from the entire team. The cap for ATK gained this way also increases by 30%.

121205.Name: Night Shades Astral Radiance
121205.Desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

121206.Name: Eclipse Hollows Corporeal Husk
121206.Desc: When Jingliu enters the Spectral Transmigration state, the Syzygy stack limit increases by 1, and Jingliu obtains 1 stack(s) of Syzygy. While she is in the Spectral Transmigration state, her CRIT DMG increases by 50%.

121301.Name: Beneficent Lotus

121302.Name: Dracore Libre
121302.Desc: Enhances the Basic ATK Beneficent Lotus to Transcendence, Divine Spear, or Fulgurant Leap.

121303.Name: Azure's Aqua Ablutes All
121303.Desc: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to a single enemy, deals Imaginary DMG to adjacent targets, and gains 2 Squama Sacrosancta, which can offset Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's consumption of skill points. Consuming Squama Sacrosancta is considered equivalent to consuming skill points.

121304.Name: Righteous Heart
121304.Desc: Increases DMG for every hit dealt. This effect is stackable and lasts until the end of this character's turn.

121307.Name: Heaven-Quelling Prismadrakon
121307.Desc: Enters the Leaping Dragon state. Attacking will cause this character to move forward rapidly for a set distance and attack all enemies touched. After entering combat via attacking enemies, deals Imaginary DMG to all enemies, and gains 1 Squama Sacrosancta.

121301.Name: Tethered to Sky
121301.Desc: Increases the stackable Righteous Heart count by 4, and gains 1 extra stack of Righteous Heart for each hit during an attack.

121302.Name: Imperium On Cloud Nine
121302.Desc: After using his Ultimate, Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's action is Advanced Forward by 100% and gains 1 extra Squama Sacrosancta.

121303.Name: Clothed in Clouds
121303.Desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

121304.Name: Zephyr's Bliss

121305.Name: Fall is the Pride
121305.Desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

121404.Name: Karmic Perpetuation
121404.Desc: When Xueyi or her allies reduce enemy Toughness with attacks, she gains stacks of Karma. When Karma reaches the max number of stacks, immediately launches a follow-up attack, dealing minor Quantum DMG to a single enemy target, bouncing for 3 times and consuming all Karma.

121407.Name: Summary Execution
121407.Desc: Attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals minor Quantum DMG to all enemies.

121401.Name: Dvesha, Inhibited
121401.Desc: Increases the DMG dealt by the Talent's follow-up attack by 40%.

121402.Name: Klesha, Breached
121402.Desc: Talent's follow-up attack reduces enemy Toughness regardless of Weakness types. At the same time, restores Xueyi's HP by an amount equal to 5% of her Max HP. When breaking Weakness, triggers the Quantum Break Effect.

121403.Name: Duḥkha, Ceased
121403.Desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

121502.Desc: Deals Physical DMG to a single enemy and applies Burden to them. For every 2 Basic ATKs, Skills, or Ultimates allies use on an enemy with Burden, allies recover 1 Skill Point.

121504.Name: Sanction
121504.Desc: Ally deals more DMG when attacking enemies inflicted with Burden.

121507.Name: Netherworld Judgment
121507.Desc: Attacks the enemy. After entering battle, applies Burden equivalent to that applied by the Skill to a random enemy.

121501.Name: One Heart

121502.Name: Two Views

121503.Name: Three Temptations
121503.Desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

121504.Name: Four Truths
121504.Desc: The Ultimate's duration is additionally extended for 1 turn(s).

121505.Name: Five Skandhas
121505.Desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

121704.Desc: Huohuo gains Divine Provision after using her Skill. If Huohuo possesses Divine Provision when an ally's turn starts or when an ally uses Ultimate, restores the ally's HP. 121707.Name: Fiend: Impeachment of Evil
121707.Desc: Causes surrounding enemies to become Horror-Struck. After entering battle with enemies afflicted with Horror-Struck, there is a high chance of reducing the ATK of the enemy targets.

121701.Name: Anchored to Vessel, Specters Nestled

121702.Name: Sealed in Tail, Wraith Subdued

This reduces the duration of Divine Provision by 1 turn. This effect can only be triggered 2 time(s) per battle.

121703.Name: Cursed by Fate, Moths to Flame
121703.Desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

121705.Desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Then, activates a Zone and deals Fire DMG to all enemies. While inside the Zone, enemy targets receive increased Ultimate DMG, with a chance of being inflicted with 1 stack of Ashen Roast when taking action.

Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Launches "Boltsunder Blitz" or "Waraxe Skyward" on a single enemy 6 time(s). Deals Wind DMG at the end.

After teammates attack, Feixiao launches follow-up attack against the primary target, dealing Wind DMG. This effect can only trigger once per turn. When using this attack, increases DMG dealt by this unit.

While in "Onrush," can actively attack all pulled enemies. At the start of every wave, deals Wind DMG to all enemies. This DMG is guaranteed to CRIT. The more enemies are pulled in, the higher the DMG multiplier becomes.

Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

122005.Name: Heavenward I Leap
122005.Desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Then, deals minor Physical DMG to a single enemy that bounces 6 times. If no Counter is triggered while Parry is active, deals Physical DMG to a random enemy target and adjacent targets when Parry ends.

122107.Desc: This unit gains the Ward effect, lasting for 20 seconds. During this time, upon entering combat by either attacking enemies or receiving an attack, immediately casts "Intuit: Cull" on a random enemy.

Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

When dealing DMG via "Intuit: Slash" or "Intuit: Cull," increases CRIT Rate by 15% and Physical RES PEN by 20%.

Using Skill summons Fuyuan: When taking action, launches follow-up attack and deals minor Fire DMG to all enemies. Additionally deals minor Fire DMG to a single random enemy, prioritizing targets with both Toughness greater than 0 and Fire Weakness. Dispels 1 debuff from all allies, and restores HP.
Using Skill repeatedly will increase Fuyuan's action count.

Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

122205.Desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

This prioritizes targets with both Toughness greater than 0 and Fire Weakness.

After allies attack "Prey," Moze deals Lightning Additional DMG and consumes 1 Charge point. For every 3 point(s) of Charge consumed, Moze launches follow-up attack on "Prey," dealing Lightning DMG. When Charge is 0, dispels the target's "Prey" state.

Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Erudition, Destruction, The Hunt: Deals Additional DMG based on Shifu's Type.

122407.Desc: Whenever an ally uses Technique, March 7th gains Charge upon entering the next battle. Using Technique regenerates Energy upon entering the next battle.

122401.Name: My Sword Stirs Starlight

122402.Name: Blade Dances on Waves' Fight

Additionally, triggers the corresponding effect based on Shifu's Path and then gains 1 point(s) of Charge. If there is no primary target available to attack, then attacks a single random enemy instead. This effect can only trigger once per turn.

122403.Name: Sharp Wit in Martial Might

Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

122406.Desc: After using Ultimate, increases the CRIT DMG dealt by the next Enhanced Basic ATK by 50%.

Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

130106.Desc: Increases Gallagher's Break Effect by 20% and Weakness Break Efficiency by 20%.

130207.Name: Manifesto of Purest Virtue
130207.Desc: Inflicts Daze on all enemies within a set area. When attacking a Dazed enemy to enter combat, deals minor Physical DMG to all enemies and regenerates energy for Argenti.

130201.Name: A Lacuna in Kingdom of Aesthetics
130201.Desc: Each stack of Apotheosis additionally increases CRIT DMG by 4%.

130202.Name: Agate's Humility
130202.Desc: If the number of enemies on the field equals to 3 or more when the Ultimate is used, ATK increases by 40% for 1 turn(s).

130203.Name: Thorny Road's Glory
130203.Desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

130204.Name: Trumpet's Dedication
130204.Desc: At the start of battle, gains 2 stack(s) of Apotheosis and increases the maximum stack limit of the Talent's effect by 2.

130205.Name: Snow, From Somewhere in Cosmos
130205.Desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

130206.Name: "Your" Resplendence
130206.Desc: When using Ultimate, ignores 30% of enemy targets' DEF.

130301.Name: Threading Fragrance
130301.Desc: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single enemy.

130302.Name: String Sings Slow Swirls
130302.Desc: After using her Skill, Ruan Mei gains Overtone. When Ruan Mei has Overtone, increase all allies' DMG and Weakness Break Efficiency.

130303.Name: Petals to Stream, Repose in Dream
130303.Desc: Increases All-Type RES PEN for all allies, and their attacks apply Thanatoplum Rebloom to enemies hit.

130304.Name: Somatotypical Helix
130304.Desc: Increases SPD for all allies (excluding this character). Breaking an enemy target's Weakness will additionally deal Ice Break DMG.

130307.Name: Silken Serenade
130307.Desc: The next time entering battle, automatically triggers the Skill for 1 time(s). After using the Technique, allies attacking enemies in Simulated Universe or Divergent Universe will always be regarded as attacking their Weakness to enter battle, and their Toughness is reduced regardless of Weakness types. For every Blessing in possession, increases Toughness Reduction and additionally deals Break DMG when breaking Weakness.

130301.Name: Neuronic Embroidery
130301.Desc: While the Ultimate's Zone is deployed, the DMG dealt by all allies ignores 20% of the target's DEF.

130302.Name: Reedside Promenade
130302.Desc: With Ruan Mei on the field, all allies increase their ATK by 40% when dealing DMG to enemies with Weakness Break.

130303.Name: Viridescent Pirouette
130303.Desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

130304.Name: Chatoyant Éclat
130304.Desc: When an enemy target's Weakness is Broken, Ruan Mei's Break Effect increases by 100% for 3 turn(s).

130305.Name: Languid Barrette
130305.Desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

130306.Name: Sash Cascade
130306.Desc: Extends the duration of the Ultimate's Zone by 1 turn(s). The Talent's Break DMG multiplier additionally increases by 200%.

130401.Name: Straight Bet
130401.Desc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single target enemy.

130402.Name: Cornerstone Deluxe
130402.Desc: Provides all allies with a Fortified Wager shield, whose Shield effect is stackable.

130403.Name: Roulette Shark
130403.Desc: Gains a random amount of Blind Bet points and inflicts Unnerved on a single enemy, dealing Imaginary DMG. When an ally hits an Unnerved enemy, the CRIT DMG dealt increases.

130404.Name: Shot Loaded Right
130404.Desc: For any single ally with Fortified Wager, their Effect RES increases, and when they get attacked, Aventurine accumulates Blind Bet. When Aventurine has Fortified Wager, he can resist Crowd Control debuffs. Upon reaching 7 points of Blind Bet, Aventurine consumes the 7 points to launch a follow-up attack that deals minor Imaginary DMG to random single enemy targets, bouncing a total of 7 times.

130407.Name: The Red or the Black
130407.Desc: Using the Technique randomly grants one out of the three DEF Boost effects with different buff values. After entering the next battle, increases all allies' DEF by the corresponding value.

130401.Name: Prisoner's Dilemma
130401.Desc: Increases CRIT DMG by 20% for allies with Fortified Wager. After using the Ultimate, provides all allies with a Fortified Wager shield, whose Shield effect is equal to 100% of the one provided by the Skill, lasting for 3 turn(s).

130402.Name: Bounded Rationality
130402.Desc: When using the Basic ATK, reduces the target's All-Type RES by 12% for 3 turn(s).

130403.Name: Droprate Maxing
130403.Desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

130404.Name: Unexpected Hanging Paradox
130404.Desc: When triggering his Talent's follow-up attack, first increases Aventurine's DEF by 40% for 2 turn(s), and additionally increases the Hits Per Action for his talent's follow-up attack by 3.

130405.Name: Ambiguity Aversion
130405.Desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

130406.Name: Stag Hunt Game
130406.Desc: For every ally that holds a Shield, the DMG dealt by Aventurine increases by 50%, up to a maximum of 150%.

130501.Name: Mind is Might
130501.Desc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single target enemy.

130502.Name: Intellectual Midwifery
130502.Desc: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single enemy.

130503.Name: Syllogistic Paradox
130503.Desc: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target enemy and applies Wiseman's Folly. When Dr. Ratio's allies attack a target afflicted with Wiseman's Folly, Dr. Ratio launches 1 follow-up attack on this target.

130504.Name: Cogito, Ergo Sum
130504.Desc: When using the Skill, there is a chance of launching a follow-up attack against the target for 1 time.

130507.Name: Mold of Idolatry
130507.Desc: Creates a Special Dimension. Enemies within the dimension are Taunted. After entering battle with enemies in this dimension, there is a high chance to reduce SPD of enemy targets.

130501.Name: Pride Comes Before a Fall
130501.Desc: The maximum stackable count for the Trace "Summation" increases by 4. When a battle begins, immediately obtains 4 stacks of Summation. Needs to unlock Summation first.

130502.Name: The Divine Is in the Details
130502.Desc: When his Talent's follow-up attack hits a target, for every debuff the target has, deals Imaginary Additional DMG equal to 20% of Dr. Ratio's ATK. This effect can be triggered for a maximum of 4 time(s) during each follow-up attack.

130503.Name: Know Thyself
130503.Desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

130504.Name: Ignorance Is Blight
130504.Desc: When triggering the Talent, additionally regenerates 15 Energy for Dr. Ratio.

130505.Name: Sic Itur Ad Astra
130505.Desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

130506.Name: Vincit Omnia Veritas
130506.Desc: Additionally increases the triggerable count for Wiseman's Folly by 1. The DMG dealt by the Talent's follow-up attack increases by 50%.

130601.Name: Monodrama
130601.Desc: Deals minor Quantum DMG to a single enemy.

130602.Name: Dreamdiver
130602.Desc: Increases an ally's CRIT DMG and Advances Forward their action.

130603.Name: The Hero with a Thousand Faces
130603.Desc: Recovers Skill Points for the team, and enables the DMG Boost provided by Sparkle's Talent to be additionally enhanced.

130604.Name: Red Herring
130604.Desc: Increases the team's Max Skill Points. Whenever an ally consumes Skill Points, enables all allies to deal more damage.

130607.Name: Unreliable Narrator
130607.Desc: Using the Technique grants all allies Misdirect. Characters with Misdirect will not be detected by enemies, and entering battle while in Misdirect recovers Skill Points for allies.

130601.Name: Suspension of Disbelief
130601.Desc: The Cipher effect granted by the Ultimate lasts for 1 extra turn. All allies with Cipher have their ATK increased by 40%.

130602.Name: Purely Fictitious
130602.Desc: Every stack of the Talent's effect allows allies to additionally ignore 8% of the target's DEF when dealing DMG.

130603.Name: Pipedream
130603.Desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

130604.Name: Life Is a Gamble
130604.Desc: The Ultimate recovers 1 more Skill Point. The Talent additionally increases the Max Skill Points by 1.

130605.Name: Parallax Truth
130605.Desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

130606.Name: Narrative Polysemy
130606.Desc: The CRIT DMG Boost effect provided by the Skill additionally increases by an amount equal to 30% of Sparkle's CRIT DMG. When Sparkle uses Skill, her Skill's CRIT DMG Boost effect will apply to all allies with Cipher. When Sparkle uses her Ultimate, any single ally who benefits from her Skill's CRIT DMG Boost will spread that effect to allies with Cipher.

130701.Name: Percipience, Silent Dawn
130701.Desc: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single enemy and has a chance of applying Arcana to the target. After attacking a target that suffers Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, or Shock, there is respectively a chance of additionally applying Arcana.

130702.Name: Decadence, False Twilight
130702.Desc: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single enemy target and any adjacent targets, with a high chance of inflicting Arcana on the targets and lowering their DEF.

130703.Name: Bliss of Otherworld's Embrace
130703.Desc: Inflicts Epiphany on all enemies, increasing the DMG the targets take in their turn. Additionally, having Arcana is regarded as having Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, and Shock. Furthermore, Arcana will not reset its stacks after causing DMG at the start of the next turn. Deals Wind DMG to all enemies.

130704.Name: Loom of Fate's Caprice
130704.Desc: When an enemy target receives DoT at the start of each turn, there is a chance for it to be inflicted with Arcana. They receive Wind DoT at the start of the turn, and Black Swan triggers additional effects based on the number of Arcana stacks.

130707.Name: From Façade to Vérité
130707.Desc: After this Technique is used, at the start of the next battle, there is a high chance for each enemy to be inflicted with Arcana repeatedly until Arcana fails to be inflicted.

130701.Name: Seven Pillars of Wisdom
130701.Desc: While Black Swan is active in battle, enemies afflicted with Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, or Shock will have their corresponding Wind, Physical, Fire, or Lightning RES respectively reduced by 25%.

130702.Name: Weep Not For Me, My Lamb
130702.Desc: When an enemy target afflicted with Arcana is defeated, there is a 100% base chance of inflicting 6 stack(s) of Arcana on adjacent targets.

130703.Name: As Above, So Below
130703.Desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

130704.Name: In Tears We Gift
130704.Desc: While in the Epiphany state, enemy targets have their Effect RES reduced by 10% and Black Swan regenerates 8 Energy at the start of these targets' turns or when they are defeated. This Energy Regeneration effect can only trigger up to 1 time while Epiphany lasts. The trigger count is reset when Epiphany is applied again.

130705.Name: Linnutee Flyway
130705.Desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

130706.Name: Pantheon Merciful, Masses Pitiful
130706.Desc:
When an enemy target gets attacked by Black Swan's allies, Black Swan has a 65% base chance of inflicting 1 stack of Arcana on the target.
Every time Black Swan inflicts Arcana on an enemy target, there is a 50% fixed chance to additionally increase the number of Arcana stacked this time by 1.

130801.Name: Trilateral Wiltcross
130801.Desc: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single enemy.

130802.Name: Octobolt Flash
130802.Desc: Gains 1 point(s) of Slashed Dream. Inflicts 1 stack(s) of Crimson Knot on a single enemy, dealing Lightning DMG to this target, as well as minor Lightning DMG to adjacent targets.

130803.Name: Slashed Dream Cries in Red
130803.Desc: Deals 3 hits of minor Lightning DMG to a single enemy. If Crimson Knot is removed from the target, then deals minor Lightning DMG to all enemies. Finally, deals 1 hit of Lightning DMG to all enemies and removes all Crimson Knots.

130804.Name: Atop Rainleaf Hangs Oneness
130804.Desc:
When Slashed Dream reaches its upper limit, the Ultimate can be activated. During the Ultimate, reduces enemies' Toughness regardless of Weakness Types and reduces all enemies' All-Type RES.
When any unit inflicts debuffs on an enemy target while using their ability, Acheron gains Slashed Dream and inflicts Crimson Knot on an enemy target.

130807.Name: Quadrivalent Ascendance
130807.Desc:
Attacks the enemy. At the start of each wave, gains Quadrivalent Ascendance, dealing Lightning DMG to all enemies and reducing Toughness regardless of Weakness Types.
If attacking a normal enemy, immediately defeats them without entering combat. When not hitting enemies, no Technique Points are consumed.

130801.Name: Silenced Sky Spake Sooth
130801.Desc: When dealing DMG to debuffed enemies, increases the CRIT Rate by 18%.

130802.Name: Mute Thunder in Still Tempest
130802.Desc: The number of Nihility characters required for the Trace "The Abyss" to achieve its highest possible effect is reduced by 1. When this unit's turn starts, gains 1 point of Slashed Dream and inflicts 1 stack of Crimson Knot on the enemy with the most Crimson Knot stacks.

130803.Name: Frost Bites in Death
130803.Desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

130804.Name: Shrined Fire for Mirrored Soul
130804.Desc: When enemy targets enter combat, inflicts them with the Ultimate DMG Vulnerability, increasing the amount of Ultimate DMG they take by 8%.

130805.Name: Strewn Souls on Erased Earths
130805.Desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

130806.Name: Apocalypse, the Emancipator
130806.Desc: Increases the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt by Acheron by 20%. The DMG dealt by Basic ATK and Skill will also be considered as Ultimate DMG and can reduce enemy toughness regardless of Weakness Types. When breaking Weaknesses, triggers the Lightning Weakness Break effect.

130901.Name: Wingflip White Noise
130901.Desc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single enemy.

130902.Name: Pinion's Aria
130902.Desc: Increases DMG dealt by all allies.

130903.Name: Vox Harmonique, Opus Cosmique
130903.Desc: Enters the Concerto state, increases all allies' ATK, and causes all teammates to immediately take action. After an attack, Robin deals Additional Physical DMG. While Concerto lasts, Robin is immune to Crowd Control debuffs. Before Concerto ends, Robin won't take turn or action, lasting until the end of the countdown.

130904.Name: Tonal Resonance
130904.Desc: Increase all allies' CRIT DMG, and Robin additionally regenerates Energy after allies attack enemies.

130907.Name: Overture of Inebriation
130907.Desc: Creates a Special Dimension around the character. Enemies within this dimension will not attack Robin. After entering battle while the dimension is active, Robin additionally regenerates 5 Energy at the start of each wave.

130901.Name: Land of Smiles
130901.Desc: While the Concerto state is active, all allies' All-Type RES PEN increases by 24%.

130902.Name: Afternoon Tea For Two
130902.Desc: While the Concerto state is active, all allies' SPD increases by 16%. The Talent's Energy Regeneration effect additionally increases by 1.

130903.Name: Inverted Tuning
130903.Desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

130904.Name: Raindrop Key
130904.Desc: When using the Ultimate, dispels Crowd Control debuffs from all allies. While Robin is in the Concerto state, increases the Effect RES of all allies by 50%.

130905.Name: Lonestar's Lament
130905.Desc:
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

130906.Name: Moonless Midnight
130906.Desc: While the Concerto state is active, the CRIT DMG for the Additional Physical DMG caused by the Ultimate increases by 450%. The effect of Moonless Midnight can trigger up to 8 time(s). And the trigger count resets each time the Ultimate is used.

131001.Name: Order: Flare Propulsion
131001.Desc: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single enemy.

131002.Name: Order: Aerial Bombardment
131002.Desc: Consumes a portion of this unit's own HP to regenerate Energy. Deals Fire DMG to a single enemy. Advances this unit's next Action.

131003.Name: Fyrefly Type-IV: Complete Combustion
131003.Desc: Enters the Complete Combustion state. Advances this unit's Action by 100%. Gains Enhanced Basic ATK and Enhanced Skill. Increases this unit's SPD, Weakness Break Efficiency, and the Break DMG received by the enemy targets, lasting until the countdown ends.

131004.Name: Chrysalid Pyronexus
131004.Desc: The lower the HP, the less DMG received. During the Complete Combustion state, the DMG Reduction effect remains at its maximum extent and Effect RES is increased. If Energy is lower than 50% when the battle starts, regenerates Energy to 50%. Once Energy is regenerated to its maximum, dispels all debuffs on this unit.

131007.Name: Δ Order: Meteoric Incineration
131007.Desc: Leaps into the air and moves about freely. After a few seconds of movement, plunges and attacks all enemies within range. At the start of each wave, applies a Fire Weakness to all enemies and deals Fire DMG to them.

131001.Name: In Reddened Chrysalis, I Once Rest
131001.Desc: When using the Enhanced Skill, ignores 15% of the target's DEF. The Enhanced Skill does not consume Skill Points.

131002.Name: From Shattered Sky, I Free Fall
131002.Desc: While in Complete Combustion, using the Enhanced Basic ATK or the Enhanced Skill to defeat an enemy target or to break their Weakness allows SAM to immediately gain 1 extra turn. This effect can trigger again after 1 turn(s).

131003.Name: Amidst Silenced Stars, I Deep Sleep
131003.Desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

131004.Name: Upon Lighted Fyrefly, I Soon Gaze
131004.Desc: While in Complete Combustion, increases SAM's Effect RES by 50%.

131005.Name: From Undreamt Night, I Thence Shine
131005.Desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

131006.Name: In Finalized Morrow, I Full Bloom
131006.Desc: While in Complete Combustion, increases SAM's Fire RES PEN by 20%. When using the Enhanced Basic ATK or Enhanced Skill, increases the Weakness Break Efficiency by 50%.

131201.Name: E—Excuse Me, Please!
131201.Desc: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single enemy.

131202.Name: R—Room Service!
131202.Desc: Deals Ice DMG to an enemy and minor Ice DMG to enemies adjacent to them. In addition, increases Misha's next Ultimate's Hits Per Action.

131203.Name: G—Gonna Be Late!
131203.Desc: Deals minor Ice DMG to single enemies. The attack bounces 3 times by default and up to a maximum of 10 times. Before each hit lands, there is a minor chance to Freeze the target.

131204.Name: Horological Escapement
131204.Desc: For every 1 Skill Point allies consume, Misha's next Ultimate delivers more Hits Per Action, and Misha regenerates his Energy.

131207.Name: Wait, You Are So Beautiful!
131207.Desc: Creates a Special Dimension that stops all enemies within. Upon entering battle against enemies within the dimension, Misha's next Ultimate deals more Hits Per Action.

131201.Name: Whimsicality of Fancy
131201.Desc: When using the Ultimate, for every enemy on the field, additionally increases the Hits Per Action for the current Ultimate by 1 hit(s), up to a maximum increase of 5 hit(s).

131202.Name: Yearning of Youth
131202.Desc: Before each hit of the Ultimate lands, there is a 24% base chance of reducing the target's DEF by 16% for 3 turn(s).

131203.Name: Vestige of Happiness
131203.Desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

131204.Name: Visage of Kinship
131204.Desc: Increases the DMG multiplier for each hit of the Ultimate by 6%.

131205.Name: Genesis of First Love
131205.Desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

131206.Name: Estrangement of Dream
131206.Desc: When using the Ultimate, increases own DMG by 30%, lasting until the end of the turn. In addition, the next time the Skill is used, recovers 1 Skill Point(s) for the team.

131401.Name: Lash of Riches
131401.Desc: Deals minor Quantum DMG to a single enemy and minor Quantum DMG to enemies adjacent to it.

131402.Name: Acquisition Surety
131402.Desc: Makes a single ally become the Debt Collector and increases their SPD. After the Debt Collector attacks, deals minor Additional Quantum DMG to each enemy target hit and consume the Collector's own HP. When Jade becomes the Debt Collector, she cannot gain the SPD boost effect, and her attacks do not consume her HP.

131403.Name: Vow of the Deep
131403.Desc: Deals Quantum DMG to all enemies and this unit's follow-up attack DMG multiplier increases.

131404.Name: Fang of Flare Flaying
131404.Desc:
After Jade or the Debt Collector unit attacks, gains 1 point of Charge for each enemy target hit. Upon reaching 8 points of Charge, consumes the 8 points to launch 1 instance of follow-up attack, dealing Quantum DMG to all enemies.
When Jade launches the follow-up attack, gains Pawned Asset and increases CRIT DMG, stacking up to 50 times.

131407.Name: Visionary Predation
131407.Desc: Inflicts Blind Fealty on enemies within a set area. Attacking an enemy with Blind Fealty causes all enemies with Blind Fealty to enter combat simultaneously. Upon entering combat, deals minor Quantum DMG to all enemies and immediately gains 15 stack(s) of Pawned Asset.

131401.Name: Altruism? Nevertheless Tradable
131401.Desc: The follow-up attack DMG from Jade's Talent increases by 32%. After the Debt Collector character attacks and the number of the enemy target(s) hit is either 2 or 1, Jade additionally gains 1 or 2 point(s) of Charge respectively.

131402.Name: Morality? Herein Authenticated
131402.Desc: When there are 15 stacks of Pawned Asset, Jade's CRIT Rate increases by 18%.

131403.Name: Honesty? Soon Mortgaged
131403.Desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

131404.Name: Sincerity? Put Option Only
131404.Desc: When using Ultimate, enables the DMG dealt by Jade to ignore 12% of enemy targets' DEF, lasting for 3 turn(s).

131405.Name: Hope? Hitherto Forfeited
131405.Desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

131406.Name: Equity? Pending Sponsorship
131406.Desc: When the Debt Collector character exists on the field, Jade's Quantum RES PEN increases by 20%, and Jade gains the Debt Collector state.

131501.Name: Skullcrush Spurs
131501.Desc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single enemy.

131502.Name: Sizzlin' Tango
131502.Desc: Initiates Standoff. After the target in the Standoff is defeated or Weakness Broken, Boothill receives Pocket Trickshot and dispels the Standoff. Boothill gains Enhanced Basic ATK and this turn does not end.

131503.Name: Dust Devil's Sunset Rodeo
131503.Desc: Applies Physical Weakness to a single enemy, deals massive Physical DMG to them, and delays their action.

131504.Name: Five Peas in a Pod
131504.Desc: Pocket Trickshot increases the Enhanced Basic ATK's Toughness Reduction and additionally deals Physical Break DMG if the target is Weakness Broken. After winning the battle, retains Pocket Trickshot for the next battle.

131507.Name: 3-9× Smile
131507.Desc: After the Technique is used, inflicts Physical Weakness on a single enemy when casting the Skill for the first time in the next battle.

131501.Name: Dusty Trail's Lone Star
131501.Desc: When the battle starts, obtains 1 stack of Pocket Trickshot. When Boothill deals DMG, ignores 16% of the enemy target's DEF.

131502.Name: Milestonemonger
131502.Desc: When in Standoff and gaining Pocket Trickshot, recovers 1 Skill Point(s) and increases Break Effect by 30%, lasting for 2 turn(s). Can also trigger this effect when gaining Pocket Trickshot stacks that exceed the max limit. But cannot trigger repeatedly within one turn.

131503.Name: Marble Orchard's Guard
131503.Desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

131504.Name: Cold Cuts Chef
131504.Desc: When the enemy target in the Standoff is attacked by Boothill, the DMG they receive additionally increases by 12%. When Boothill is attacked by the enemy target in the Standoff, the effect of him receiving increased DMG is offset by 12%.

131505.Name: Stump Speech
131505.Desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

131506.Name: Crowbar Hotel's Raccoon
131506.Desc: When triggering the Talent's Break DMG, additionally deals Break DMG to the target equal to 40% of the original DMG multiplier and additionally deals Break DMG to adjacent targets equal to 70% of the original DMG multiplier.

131701.Name: Ninjutsu: Rise Above Tumbles
131701.Desc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to one designated enemy.

131703.Name: Nindō Supreme: Aishiteru
131703.Desc:
Enters the "Sealform" state, gains an extra turn, obtains 3 points of "Chroma Ink," and increases Weakness Break Efficiency and Break Effect.
While in the "Sealform" state, gains Enhanced Basic ATK. After using Enhanced Basic ATK, consumes 1 point of "Chroma Ink." When "Chroma Ink" is depleted, exit the "Sealform" state.

131704.Name: Ninja Tech: Endurance Gauge
131704.Desc:
When enemy targets' Weakness are Broken, Rappa deals Imaginary Break DMG to them that additionally Bounces 2 time(s). Each instance of DMG deals minor Imaginary Break DMG and Toughness Reduction regardless of Weakness Type to random enemy units. The Toughness Reduction effect only takes effect against enemy targets with Toughness greater than 0. The added instances of DMG will prioritize targets with Toughness greater than 0.
When inflicting Weakness Break, triggers the Imaginary Weakness Break effect.

131707.Name: Ninja Dash: By Leaps and Bounds
131707.Desc: Enters the "Graffiti" state. Move forward rapidly for a set distance and attack any enemies touched. After entering combat via attacking enemies, deals Toughness Reduction regardless of Weakness Type to each enemy target and deals Imaginary Break DMG to them as well as their adjacent targets. At the same time, this unit regenerates Energy.

131701.Name: Returned Is the Revenant With No Ferry Toll
131701.Desc: When using Ultimate to enter the "Sealform" state, DMG dealt by Rappa ignores 15% of the targets' DEF, and Rappa regenerates 20 Energy when she leaves the "Sealform" state.

131702.Name: Free Is the Mind Enlightened by Haikus
131702.Desc: The Toughness Reduction of the first 2 hits of the Enhanced Basic ATK against the one designated enemy increases by 50%.
